resources.string: Are you ready to train your brain?

You think you have all it takes to train your brain? Are you ready for testing your wits? Answer these questions within 2 minutes to show what you really got inside! P.S. Press the bulb icon for hints...It\'s free!
A farmer has 17 sheep and all but 9 die. How many are left?
The day after tomorrow is the third day after Wednesday. Which day was the day before yesterday?
What parking spot number is the car parked in?
There is only one correct answer to this question. Which answer is this?
Four daughters and three sons. Each daughter has 3 sisters and 3 brothers, and each brother has 2 brothers and 4 sisters.
How many answers do you think you got right?
Your progress will be lost.Do you want to quit?
